About.paragraph: Our vision is to create an inclusive community of equity for the contribution to peace and sustainable development through the promotion of access to education for street children; the socio-economic empowerment of street children; and the strengthening of social cohesion and patriotism

Services.text: Fighting against the effects of drug use and consumption of prohibited drinks ofvulnerable children;
Support vulnerable children on the basis of moral, spiritual and material support in order to return to school and promote a spirit of work;
Providing professional development opportunities for vulnerable children;
To provide socio-economic assistance to vulnerable children and elderly women in difficulty, and to promote the values of social cohesion;
Accompany the Foundation's beneficiaries in the development, implementation and monitoring-evaluation of their development projects;
Strengthen the capacities of the beneficiaries of the Foundation Destiny Focus Burundi and ensure their supervision in the fields of health, environment, peace, etc.
Accompany other organizations working in the sector through sensitization and/orcarry out joint activities with them for the protection of children and the consolidation of peace;

Features.text: To set up projects of supervision and development in favor of vulnerable children
Morally and psychologically support children traumatized by the absence of their parents
Provide material assistance to vulnerable children
To set up listening sessions and support teachings to encourage a change in their mentality
